participant_1.background:
I can stay up late to watch my favorite TV shows.
I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.
i speak french and english fluently.
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
I am proud of my ability to get a degree in two years despite my reputation as a slacker.

participant_2.background:
I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion.
I do not do my laundry as often as I should.
i like football on tv.
My best friend died in a car accident when we were in college.
i have been married for five years.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I am watching a nature documentary on Netflix right now.
That sounds really relaxing. I love nature documentaries.
Me too! I find them so peaceful. Do you have any favorite nature documentaries?
I really liked the one about the penguins in Antarctica.
Oh yeah, that was a great one! I also really liked the one about the gorillas in the Congo.
Those are both great choices. I also like the ones about the lions in the Serengeti.
Oh yeah, those are really good too! I love watching lions hunt.
Me too! They're so graceful and powerful.
Yeah, they are. Nature is amazing.
I know, right? It's so beautiful.
It sure is. I'm glad we both love nature documentaries.
Me too! They're so relaxing and enjoyable.
Yeah, they are. I'm going to finish watching this one and then I'm going to go for a walk in the park.
That sounds like a great idea. I love walking in the park.
Me too! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad we both like nature.
